name: Take a Taco
description:
Download this game now: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.variablegames.takeataco

Get all the coins as you can!

Help this Mexican wrestler to collect all the coins scattered around town ... Before you run out of energy!

Eats tacos, tacos and more tacos to replenish your energy and do not forget the spicy ..
Be careful with snakes of the Mexican desert, since being bitten by a rattlesnake would be very painful!
Do not let your Mexican wrestler drink lots of beer, this will reduce your speed!

Features:
-Unlocks levels with unique gameplay!
-Unlocks Items to customize your Mexican wrestler!
-Accepts the challenge of reaching the various game achievements!
-What how far you can go with your Mexican wrestler before the power runs out?
-Set and break your own records and those of your friends on Google Play Games!
-New content in each update!
